comment.author: 87914514@N00
comment._content: I'm guessing this would have been at a relocation camp for japanese-americans?

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
You are correct. This image is part of the series: Central Photographic File of the War Relocation Authority, compiled 1942-1945, here at the U.S. National Archives.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
